## ConstructorArgs type

Extract the arguments from a class constructor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ConstructorArgs<K extends {
    new (...args: any[]): any;
}> = K extends {
    new (): any;
} ? never[] : K extends {
    new (a: infer A): any;
} ? [A] : K extends {
    new (a: infer A, b: infer B): any;
} ? [A, B] : K extends {
    new (a: infer A, b: infer B, c: infer C): any;
} ? [A, B, C] : K extends {
    new (a: infer A, b: infer B, c: infer C, d: infer D): any;
} ? [A, B, C, D] : K extends {
    new (a: infer A, b: infer B, c: infer C, d: infer D, e: infer E): any;
} ? [A, B, C, D, E] : never;
```

## Example


```ts
class Foo {
 constructor(a: string, b: number[], c: Promise<boolean>) {}
}
const x: ConstructorArgs<typeof Foo> // [string, number[], Promise<boolean>]
 = ['hello world', [1, 2, 3], Promise.resolve(false) ];

```
